description: Sweet red capsicums and creamy feta enhance this light buttermilk corn bread.
name: Capsicum & Feta Corn Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Mix the polenta, baking powder and bicarbonate of soda in a large bowl. Melt 30g of butter and add to the polenta mix with eggs, buttermilk, milk, cheddar, salt and coriander. Mix well.
Stir in the roasted red capsicums and feta. Place the remaining butter in a large round cake tin and place in the oven for 2 minutes, until melted and sizzling.
Pour in the cornbread mix and bake for 35-40 minutes until golden and risen. Leave to rest for 15 minutes then slice into wedges and serve.
